dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: He’s found an Infinity Stone. Off Bad Nebula’s intrigued look...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAD NEBULA and GAMORA study a holo-map.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: On a planet called “Morag.”

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Father’s plan is finally in motion.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: One stone isn’t six.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It’s a start. If he gets them all... THANOS steps from the smoke, armored, wielding A HUGE BLA

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: We'll never have to do this again. THREE ALIENS CHARGE HIM. THANOS CUTS THEM DOWN. He wipes blood from his face, and SMILES.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: He’1ll miss it.

dialogues.speaker: STRIDE, THANOS SLICES IT IN TWO.
dialogues.text: He looks up to his ship. A BEAM BATHES HIM IN LIGHT...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Nebula and Gamora turn as THANOS ENTERS THE FLIGHT DE

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Ronan has located the Power Stone. I'm dispatching you to his ship.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: He won’t like it. Thanos wipes the blood from his blade.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: His alternative is death. Ronan’s obsession clouds his judgement. After Loki, I’m taking no chances.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: We will not fail you, father. Thanos finally lays his eyes on her.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: No. You won’t.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: I swear I will make you proud- SUDDENLY, BAD NEBULA STAGGERS, hand to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Sister, what’s-  66 Thanos watches, curious, as NEBULA DROPS TO A KNEE. SUDDENLY, A HOLO-PROJECTION OF RHODEY BEAMS FROM HER EYE.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: So, all we have to do is hang out, wait for this Quill guy, and follow him to the Power Stone, right?

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Let’s take cover. We’re not the only ones in this reality looking for the stones. BAD NEBULA SLUMPS, breaking the projection. Gamora goes t her, trying to prop her up.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Who was that?

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: I...don’t know. My head...splitting... Bad Nebula winces. Gamora looks to Thanos.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Her synaptic drive was probably damaged in battle-

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Sshbh... Thanos looks down at Bad Nebula. He gently lifts her head with his blade. Something’s not right.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bring her to my ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony swoops onto the helipad outside the wrecked penthous

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MIND STONE GLOWS IN LOKI’S SCEPTER. Pull back to see it’s in Al NATASHA’S HANDS, as she stands with... Al THOR, Al STEVE, Al TONY, Al HULK, AND Al CLINT (THE IC SHOT FROM AVENGERS 1), all staring down at...LOKI.  67

dialogues.speaker: LOKI
dialogues.text: If it’s all the same to you...I’1ll have that drink now. From behind cover, TONY PEERS AT THE BACK SIDE OF THE AVENGERS TABLEAU.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Cap, I’ve got to say that outfit does nothing for your ass.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: No one asked you to look, Tony. REVEAL TINY SCOTT ON TONY’S SHOULDER.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: I think you look great, Cap. As far as I’m concerned, that’s America’s ass. Al NATASHA Who gets the magic wand? Al STEVE SHIELD’s coming up now.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Ball’s in play. Head’s up, Cap. From hiding, Tony eyes Al NATASHA WITH LOKI’S SCEPTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STEVE negotiates an empty hallway, head on a swivel. He heads for AN ELEVATOR.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: Mind Stone’s on the move.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: I'm in position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al NATASHA hands LOKI’S SCEPTER to...AGENT SITWELL. He’s about to touch the tip when... Al NATASHA Careful with that.  68 Al CLINT pours himself A DRINK at Tony’s bar. Al CLINT BARTON Unless you want your mind erased. And not in the fun way. Sitwell carries the scepter to THE SERVICE ELEVATOR...WHE STRIKE TEAM WAITS. BROCK RUMLOW hits “down.”

dialogues.speaker: BROCK RUMLOW
dialogues.text: We promise to be extra careful. Scott stares at Sitwell and Rumlow.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Who are these guys?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: SHIELD. Actually, Hydra. But we didn’t know that yet.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Seriously? ‘Cause it’s kind of obvious they’re bad guys.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You're small but you’re talking loud. Al THOR WALKS LOKI PAST Al STEVE. Al STEVE (INTO COM) I’m on my way down to coordinate search and rescue. Loki rolls his eyes...AND TRANSFORMS INTO A COPY OF STEVE

dialogues.speaker: LOKI/STEVE
dialogues.text: “I’m on my way down to coordinate search and rescue.” I mean, really, how do you keep your food down? Thor slaps A MUZZLE on Loki, who REVERTS TO HIS OWN FORM. Al THOR Yes, that’s much better. He steers his brother into THE MAIN ELEVATOR. Al THOR (CONT'D) You coming, Stark?  69 Nearby, Al TONY uses his gauntleted hand to place THE TESSERACT into AN ALUMINUM ATTACHE CASE. Al TONY One sec, just packing my lunch.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: All right, you're up, Little Buddy. There’s our stone Al Tony crosses to the elevator. Scott takes position, readying himself.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: All right. Flick me. Tony flicks Scott with a finger, sending him sailing into ATTACHE CASE. TONY leaps out the window, Bleeding Edge armor forming ar him as he falls. Al Tony joins the others in the elevator. Then... Al HULK steps up to THE ALREADY CROWDED ELEVATOR. Avenger smile awkwardly. There’s no room. Al HULK (angrily) Hulk take stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony circles around the building...PASSING THE DESCENDING SERVICE ELEVATOR, CROWDED WITH RUMLOW’S STRIKE TEAM.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Okay, Cap, I make ten of them, just passing the 80th floor.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Got it. Head to the lobby.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Already on my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitwell, Rumlow, and the STRIKE TEAM descend.  70

dialogues.speaker: AGENT SITWELL, (INTO PHONE)
dialogues.text: Evidence secured, we are en route to Dr. List...No, no hitches at all, Mr. Secretary... The car stops. The doors open...AND OUR STEVE GETS ON.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT SITWELL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Captain, I thought you were coordinating search and rescue?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Change of plans. Steve glances at Rumlow, who’s holding THE SCEPTER.

dialogues.speaker: BROCK RUMLOW
dialogues.text: Cap.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Rumlow. The doors close. Everyone rides in silence. Tension mount

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I got a call from the Secretary's office. I’m going to be running point on the scepter. Behind him, Sitwell and Rumlow exchange a glance.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT SITWELL
dialogues.text: Sir? I don’t understand-

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: We've had word there might be an attempt to steal it. Steve reaches for the scepter, but Rumlow holds tight.

dialogues.speaker: BROCK RUMLOW
dialogues.text: Afraid we can’t allow that, Cap.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT SITWELL
dialogues.text: (pulling out his phone) I’ll have to check with the Director-

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: No. Trust me. It’s okay... Steve leans in, drawing them all close. Then he whispers:  71

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hail Hydra. THEIR EYES GO WIDE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator OPENS. Steve steps out with THE SCEPTER. Sitwell and Rumlow stare after him, amazed. THE DOORS CLOSE. STEVE SMILES TO HIMSELF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al HULK lumbers down the stairs, taking chunks out of cor in the tiny stairwell. He snorts, growing more pissed off Al HULK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al TONY carries the TESSERACT CASE through THE LOBBY, followed by Al THOR and LOKI. SWAT TROOPERS clear a path. ONE TURNS ASIDE, RAISING HIS MASK, REVEALING...OUR TONY.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Okay, Thumbelina, you’re a go. MOVE IN CLOSE on Al TONY to see...SCOTT, HIDING IN HIS HA

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Bombs away. SCOTT DROPS BENEATH TONY’S BLACK SABBATH SHIRT. INT. TONY STARK’S SHIRT - CONTINUOUS (AVENGERS 1) SCOTT slides down Tony’s clavicle to the RT. He sniffs.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Is that...Axe body spray?

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: Yeah, I had a can in the desk for emergencies. Can we focus, please?  72

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: I’m going inside you...NOW. SCOTT SQUEEZES BETWEEN Al TONY’S SKIN AND THE RT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al TONY, Al THOR, and LOKI approach the door. ALEXANDER PIERCE intercepts them with a team of SHIELD AGENTS.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER PIERCE
dialogues.text: Mind if I ask where you’re going? Al THOR We were thinking lunch, then Asgard. And you are? Al TONY Alexander Pierce. He’s the guy behind the guys behind Fury, so don’t mess.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER PIERCE
dialogues.text: My friends call me Mr. Secretary. (to Thor) I have to ask you to turn the prisoner over to me. Al THOR Loki will answer to Odin, himself.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER PIERCE
dialogues.text: No, he’1ll answer to us. “Odin” can have what’s left. (to Tony) And we'll need the case back, too. That’s been SHIELD property for over seventy years. Al TONY I’m not gonna argue who has authority here but jurisdictionally speaking, we are on Stark property. That is my name on the glass...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER PIERCE
dialogues.text: Just give me the case. Across the lobby, TONY OBSERVES FROM BEHIND HIS SWAT HELM  73

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Move it, Stuart Little. Things are getting dicey out here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. TONY STARK’S RT - DAY (AVENGERS 1) Scott studies A TANGLE OF COPPER WIRING.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: This place is a mess. (finding a wire) You promise you won’t die?

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: You’re only giving me a minor cardiac dysrhythmia-

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: That doesn’t actually sound minor- Tony sees PIERCE reaching for Al TONY'S CASE.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Window's closing. Pull my plug.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Here goes... SCOTT YANKS THE WIRE OUT OF ITS SOCKET. IN THE LOBBY, Al TONY GRIPS HIS CHEST.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER PIERCE
dialogues.text: Stark? Al Tony SEIZES, dropping. THE TESSERACT CASE CLATTERS TO GROUND. PIERCE and Al THOR kneel to assist.

dialogues.speaker: MEDIC
dialogues.text: Al THOR Stark? Somebody get some help! Is it your chest machine? THE LOBBY BUZZES, SHIELD AGENTS RUNNING EVERYWHERE. In the bustle, SCOTT SLIDES OUT OF Al TONY’S SLEEVE. He SHOVES THE TESSERACT CASE HARD. It SPINS across the floor RIGHT INTO TONY’S HAND. Tony walks toward a side door.  74

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Meet me in the alley. I’m just gonna grab a slice at Famous Ray’s-—

dialogues.speaker: SMASHING TONY IN THE FACE, SENDING HIM TUMBLING.
dialogues.text: Al HULK BASHES HIS WAY THROUGH THE LOBBY. The Tesseract Case hits the floor, popping open. THE TESSERACT FALLS OUT, spinning past Tiny Scott... STOPPING AT LOKI’S FEET. Loki stares at it in disbelief. glances at Al Thor and Pierce giving Al Tony first aid.

dialogues.speaker: THEN LOKI CALMLY REACHES DOWN WITH HIS MANACLED HANDS, GR
dialogues.text: THE TESSERACT...AND TELEPORTS AWAY. Scott stares, stunned

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: That wasn’t supposed to happen, was it? Al THOR LOOKS UP, REALIZING... Al THOR WHERE’S LOKI? SHIELD TEAMS FAN OUT, ON ALERT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STEVE heads down a hall, SCEPTER IN HAND.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY, (OVER SPEAKER)
dialogues.text: Building-wide alert, all units. Target Loki, maximum force.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Tony? What’s going on? Tell me you got that cube- Al STEVE (0.S.) Strike Teams, clear Forty, then work down. Before Steve can hide...Al STEVE ROUNDS THE CORNER.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Oh, great. Al STEVE (INTO COM) Disregard. I have eyes on Loki, Fourteenth Floor.  75

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I’m not Loki. And I don’t want to hurt you. Al STEVE PULLS HIS SHIELD OFF HIS BACK. Al STEVE You're not going to get the chance- Al STEVE KICKS STEVE IN THE FACE. Steve stumbles.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Forgot about that one. They grapple. Both their shields fall to the ground... THEY BOTH STAMP ON THEM, simultaneously flipping the shie back to their arms. Al Steve looks impressed. Al STEVE SWINGS. STEVE DUCKS, HAMMERING HIM. Al Steve wip the blood from his lip, squaring off. Al STEVE I can do this all day-

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know... They battle on. Al Steve tackles Steve, knocking his shie aside, RIPPING OPEN ONE OF STEVE’S BELT COMPARTMENTS: THE COMPASS FALLS OUT, OPENING TO REVEAL PEGGY’S PICTURE. Steve goes cold. He picks up the compass, FLABBERGASTED. Al STEVE Where'd you get this?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: PX. Camp Lehigh. 1943. Al Steve stares at Steve, eyes narrowing. Al STEVE You've got a lot of nerve. HE HAMMERS STEVE ACROSS THE HALL. Steve goes skidding. He groans, looking up to see...HE’S INCHES FROM THE SCEPTER. Al STEVE moves in. STEVE whips around, touching THE SCEPT to Al Steve’s chest. Al STEVE’S EYES GO BLACK. HE FREEZES  76 Steve stares, panting. Finally, he picks up the compass f the floor, then considers Al STEVE’S ASS.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: That is America’s ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMART HULK'S BODY lies slumped on an Adirondack chair, a floppy sun hat covering his face.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I wish I could help you, Bruce... THE ANCIENT ONE waters a rooftop garden. She looks to AST BANNER, who’s only just getting used to being see-through

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But if I were to give up the Time Stone to help your reality, I'd be dooming my own.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Yeah, with all due respect, I’m not sure the science supports that.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: And yet, you’re the one currently standing in the middle of my hydrangeas. Banner looks down to see, indeed, he has phased through t middle of the hydrangeas. He steps out of it.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Lady, I just want to borrow your necklace-

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: At what cost?

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The Infinity Stones create the experience you know as the flow of time. Remove one of the stones, and the flow splits. She plucks the GREEN TIME STONE out of the array: A SMALL BLACKENED RIVER BRANCHES OFF FROM THE FIRST.  77

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now, your timeline might benefit. My new one...would definitely not. SHE GESTURES. OUR CAMERA ZOOMS INTO THE BLACKENED TUNNEL.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: In this new branch reality, without our chief weapon against the forces of darkness, our world would be overrun... MOVE UP TO SEE DORMAMMU IN THE SKY. HE OPENS HIS MOUTH...

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: For each stone you remove, you’ll create a new, vulnerable timeline. Millions will suffer. (beat) Now tell me, Doctor. Can your science prevent all that?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: No. But it can erase it. Astral Banner reaches in and grabs THE VIRTUAL TIME STONE

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Because once we're done with the stones, we can return each one to its own timeline. At the moment it was taken. So chronologically, in that reality, the stone never left.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: You're leaving out the most important part, though. In order to put the stones back, you’d have to survive.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: We will. Iwill. I promise.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: I can’t risk this reality ona promise. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It is the duty of the Sorcerer Supreme to protect the Time Stone-

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Yeah? Then why the hell did Strange give it away? The Ancient One freezes.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: What did you say?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Strange gave Thanos the Time Stone.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: Willingly? Why?

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Don’t know. Maybe he made a mistake.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: Or I did. The Ancient One looks out over a recovering NYC.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Strange is meant to be the best of us.

dialogues.speaker: ASTRAL BANNER
dialogues.text: Then he must have had a reason.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: I fear you may be right... Finally, she waves her hand and...WHOOSH! HE REINTEGRATES INTO THE SMART HULK BODY. Smart Hulk gets up, WOOZY.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ONE
dialogues.text: I’m counting on you, Bruce. (re. the city behind her) We all are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAD NEBULA HANGS SUSPENDED. CABLES travel from her “brain to a GLOWING WALL OF DATABANKS, which silhouettes... THANOS. He regards her for a moment. Then...

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Run diagnostics. Show me her memory file. At the console, EBONY MAW SCANS NEBULA’S INFORMATION. NEBULA’S BODY TWITCHES. GAMORA WATCHES, TORN. SOON...AN ALERT FLASHES.

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: Sir, the file appears...entangled. It was a memory, but not hers. (dawning on him) There’s another consciousness sharing her network. Another Nebula.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Impossible.

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: This duplicate carries a time stamp...from nine years in the future.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Where is this “other Nebula?”

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: In our solar system. On Morag.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Can you access her?

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: Yes. The two are linked. THANOS PEERS INTO BAD NEBULA’S GLASSY EYES...

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Search the duplicate’s memory for Infinity Stones. Maw works the console. Thanos steps aside as BAD NEBULA’S BODY QUIVERS. AFTER A BEAT, A BEAM SHOOTS OUT OF HER EYE.

dialogues.speaker: PROJECTING AN IMAGE OF AVENGERS COMPOUND
SMART HULK, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: -the Stones have been in a lot of places throughout history.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Our history. Not all of them are going to be a fun drop-in.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Which means we’ve got to pick our targets.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Exactly. Let’s start here-

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Freeze image. FREEZES. THANOS STARES, RECOGNIZING THEM.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Terrans?

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Avengers. Unruly wretches. He gestures to A BLURRY REFLECTION WITHIN THE HOLOGRAM.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What’s this reflection. Amplify this, Maw. EBONY MAW ZOOMS IN, REVEALING...A REFLECTION OF NEBULA.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: I don’t understand. Two Nebulas? Thanos walks into the hologram, studying the faces.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: No. The same Nebula. From two different times. (to Ebony Maw) Set course for Morag. And scan the duplicate’s memories. (beat) I want to see everything...  81

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frigga walks down a corridor, alone. THOR SNEAKS FROM COL TO COLUMN, FOLLOWING HER. She PAUSES, sensing something. Thor HIDES. When he peers again, FRIGGA IS GONE. Then he turns around to find FRIGGA STANDING BESIDE HIM. Thor jum

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Mother! What? Nothing. Hello.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: You're better off leaving the sneaking to your brother. (re. his bathrobe) What are you wearing?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I always wear this. It’s one of my favorites.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: And what's wrong with your eye?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Oh, that. You remember the...Battle of Harokin. I took a...broadsword to the face? He trails off, at a loss, staring at his dead mom. Frigga gently lays her hand on his cheek...READING HIM.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Oh. You’re not the Thor I know at all, are you?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Yes, I am-

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: I was raised by witches, boy. I see with more than eyes, you know that. (eyeing him) I can see the future hasn’t been kind to you, has it?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I didn’t say I was from the future...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor... 82 Frigga gives her son a stern, “don’t lie to me” look. Tho stares at his mom a long moment. Then, he cracks:

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I’m totally from the future.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Yes, you are.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I need to talk to you.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: We can talk. Frigga GRABS Thor by the cloak and yanks him INT. ASGARD, PALACE, JANE FOSTER’S CHAMBER - away.

dialogues.speaker: A PAIR OF MODERN BOOTS BENEATH AN ASGARDIAN GOWN
dialogues.text: TILT UP TO FIND...JANE FOSTER. She studies the outfit. Behind her, ROCKET RAISES THE EXTRACTION DEVICE OVER HIS HEAD, ABOUT TO JAB... INT. ASGARD, PALACE, FRIGGA’S CHAMBER - DAY (THOR 2) FRIGGA sits with THOR in her chambers.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: -..-and then it was done. His head over there. Body over there. And me in the middle. Just an idiot with an axe.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: You're no idiot. You’re here, aren’t you? Seeking counsel from the smartest person in Asgard?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Yeah, I guess.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: An idiot, no. A failure, absolutely.  83

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: That’s a little harsh-

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Quite a colossal one, by the sound of it.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Okay, maybe just stop talking.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: And you know what that makes you? Just like everyone else.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I’m not supposed to be like everyone else, though.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Everyone fails at “who they’re supposed to be,” Thor. The measure of a person, of a hero, is how well they succeed at being who they are. Thor stares at her, biting back emotions.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I've really missed you, Mum.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: I got it I got it I got it! A TROOP OF EINHERJAR CHASE AFTER HIM. INT. ASGARD, PALACE, FRIGGA’S CHAMBER - DAY (THOR 2) THOR looks at THE OBSERVATORY: Dark Elves will soon attac

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Mum, I have to tell you something-

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: No, son. You don’t. You’ve come to repair your future, not mine.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: But your future-  84

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Is none of my business. Thor stares at her, torn. THEN ROCKET RACES INTO THE ROOM

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: (to Frigga) Hi. You must be Mom. (to Thor, re. the device) I got the thing. Come on, we gotta move- Thor looks to Frigga.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I wish we had more time-

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: This was a gift. Now, go be the man you’re meant to be. (beat) And eat a salad. Thor smiles. He and Rocket activate their time suits.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: Three...two-

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: No. Wait. THOR DRAMATICALLY HOLDS OUT HIS HAND. A long moment passe

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: What am I looking at?

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Sometimes it takes a second. Then...MJOLNIR SAILS INTO HER SON’S HAND. She grins, prou

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: (relieved) Still worthy. Mother and son look at each other for the last time.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Mum.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Son. THEN, WHOOSH! THOR AND ROCKET DISAPPEAR.  85 Suddenly...THE PALACE RUMBLES. Frigga looks to the window

dialogues.speaker: WHERE A DARK ELF WARSHIP DECLOAKS. SHE REACHES FOR A SWOR
dialogues.text: PRELAP: “COME AND GET YOUR LOVE,” BY REDBONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER QUILL, in RED, PLEATHER TRENCH COAT AND HEADPHONES, dances through the ruins of an alien city.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: So, he’s an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: Yes. Quill spins, arms out, eyes shut. When the horizon finall settles...he sees A METAL MAN STANDING THERE WAITING FOR

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: Oh, fu- BAM! RHODEY DECKS QUILL IN THE FACE. Quill drops, out col

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: Sorry about that. I know you guys were teammates and everything.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: Do you hear me complaining? Nebula rifles through Quill’s sack. She pulls out AN ELECTRONIC LOCK PICK.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: The tool of a thief. Come on. They set out toward the RUINED CITY.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA AND RHODEY. SHE STEPS IN. RHODEY TRIES TO STOP HER
RHODEY
dialogues.text: Hang on. This would be about the time the spikes come out, you know, with the skeletons still on them?

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: I’m just saying, when you break into a place called, “The Temple of the Power Stone”, there are usually... Ahead, they see...THE POWER STONE ORB HOVERING ABOVE ITS PEDESTAL, SURROUNDED BY A WEB OF LASER THREADS.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Traps and stuff. (Nebula steps inside) Okay, don’t say I didn’t warn you. Rhodey scans the laser web, strategizing.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: These are photovoltaic lasers on a constantly shifting matrix. Gonna be damn near impossible to neutralize unless we-

dialogues.speaker: SHE GRABS THE ORB...BUT THE WEB GRIPS HER, FRYING HER ARM
dialogues.text: She pulls out the orb, but sees Rhodey staring at HER BLACKENED CLAW.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: I wasn’t always like this. He sees actual emotion somewhere inside her. Favor his exoskeletal leg braces as he softens.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: Yeah, me either. I guess we do the best with what we’ve got, huh? SHE HANDS HIM THE ORB WITH JUST THE GHOST OF A SMILE.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let’s get out of here. Place gives me the creeps. Sync up. Three... two...one...  87 RHODEY TAPS HIS CUFF, SHRINKING AWAY. Nebula goes for hers...BUT HER EYES ROLL BACK. SHE COLLAPSES, SEIZING VIOLENTLY, THEN GOING STILL. Her e snap open, projecting a hologram of...THANOS.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: What’s wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK IN THE INTERROGATION CELL, BAD NEBULA’S EYE BEAMS: I THANOS’ LODGE, THE AVENGERS SURROUND A ONE-ARMED THANOS.

dialogues.speaker: BRUCE BANNER, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: You murdered trillions.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: You should be grateful.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Where are the stones? THANOS SMIRKS, PUTTING THE PIECES TOGETHER.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Gone. Reduced to atoms.

dialogues.speaker: BRUCE BANNER, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: You used them two days ago!

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: I used the stones to destroy the stones. The work is done. It always will be... HE STEPS FORWARD, FINISHING HIS OWN THOUGHT.

dialogues.speaker: I AM INEVITABLE- I AM INEVITABLE.
dialogues.text: Thanos nods to Maw, who freezes the program. THANOS WALKS THROUGH THE HOLOGRAM, STUDYING THE HEROES.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: What did you do to them?

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Nothing. Yet. (piecing it together) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They're not trying to stop something I’m going to do in our time. They’re trying to undo something I’ve already done in theirs.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: (uneasy) The stones.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: I found them all. I won. Tipped the cosmic scales to balance.

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: Sire. This is your future?

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: My destiny. He stares, mind whirling. He nods. THE MEMORY RESUMES.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: He’s lying.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: My father is many things. A liar is not one of them.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (HOLO)
dialogues.text: Thank you, daughter. Perhaps I’ve treated you too- WHUMP. THOR CUTS OFF THANOS’ HEAD. THE VIEW LINGERS AS “NEBULA” STARES AT HER DEAD FATHER. THANOS STUDIES HIS SEVERED HEAD...AND SMILES.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And that is destiny fulfilled. Gamora stares, torn. But Ebony Maw fumes on Thanos’ behal

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: Sire. Your daughter is a traitor. EBONY MAW GESTURES: CABLES WRAP AROUND NEBULA’S NECK. SHE AWAKENS, PANICKED. She looks up at Thanos.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: (choking) No. Please, father. That’s not me. I would never betray you. Please-  89 Thanos UNWRAPS the cord. He touches his daughter's face.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Ssh, child. I know. And you’1l have the chance to prove it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZZZT. ON THE FLOOR, NEBULA’S EYES SNAP OPEN, HORRIFIED.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: He knows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEBULA rushes to the console and opens A COMMUNICATION LI

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Barton, Romanoff, come in. We have a problem. Thanos knows! Thanos-— Suddenly, A SHADOW falls over the Pod. Nebula looks out t cockpit window... AS A TRACTOR BEAM PULLS THE ENTIRE POD SKYWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE ALLEY, Steve drops down from the building. He hear WHISTLE. TONY waves from behind a crashed car.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: We've got a problem.

dialogues.speaker: TIME CUT
dialogues.text: STEVE huddles with TONY and SCOTT.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: How could you lose it?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: What do you want? I got hit in the head with a Hulk!  90

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: You said we only had one shot. This was our shot. We shot it. It was six stones or nothing! Six stones—

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You're not helping-

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: You ruined the Time Heist!

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Okay, okay, Loki’s from Asgard, he’s comfortable there. Knows the restaurants. It’s a safe bet he visits home. If we can just grab This-Thor and explain the situation, he and I can fly-

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Loki could be anywhere in the universe. We’d be old men before we found him. As Steve and Scott debate, MOVE IN ON TONY, MIND WHIRLING

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What other options did we have on the Tesseract?

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa. We don’t have any other options. We can’t go to any other times. No do-overs! We've only got one particle left, each. Use it now, that’s it, bye-bye, we don’t come home.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: But if we don’t try, nobody else comes home, either.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I got it! There’s another way to re-take the Tesseract, and acquire new particles. (to Steve) Military installation, Garden State. Steve eyes Tony, BEGINNING TO UNDERSTAND.  91

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: When were they both there?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I have a vaguely exact idea.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: How vague?

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Hang on, what’s in New Jersey?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I know they were there, and I know how I know. STEVE STUDIES TONY A LONG MOMENT...

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Looks like we’re improvising.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Wait! What are you improvising? STEVE HANDS SCOTT THE STAFF.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Scott, take this back to the Compound.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: All right, suits on. Try these coordinates. 04-07-19-70...

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Steve- Cap- Captain America, if you do this and he’s wrong...you’re not coming back. Steve and Tony let the weight of that sink in. dHe’s righ Even so, Tony turns to Steve.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You trust me?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I do.

dialogues.speaker: CUFFS. TONY AND STEVE SHRINK TO NOTHING...
Unknown
dialogues.text: CUE MUSIC: “HEY LAWDY MAMA,” STEPPENWOLF. A 1970 Oldsmobile motors down a wooded road. The bumper sticker reads: “NUFF SAID.” At the wheel, STAN LEE (48), LONG HAIR, MOUSTACHE, OPEN SHIRT, sings along to the radio, TWO LADIES at his side. He passes by AN ARMY BASE, throwing a peace sign to A GUA

dialogues.speaker: STAN LEE
dialogues.text: Make love, not war, baby! He roars off, passing A FADED SIGN: “U.S. ARMY - CAMP LEH BIRTHPLACE OF CAPTAIN AMERICA.” MOVE INTO THE BASE...

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You weren’t actually born here, right?

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIERS MARCH PAST AS...
dialogues.text: Tony and Steve round the corner, TONY IN A LAB COAT and S IN GREEN KHAKIS, LOW-PULLED CAP, AND MIRRORED SUNGLASSES.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: The idea of me was.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: (looking around) All right. If I was SHIELD and I wanted to hide my quasi-fascistic black site, where would I hide it?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: In plain sight. Steve nods at A MAN IN A GRAY SUIT approaching a building “MUNITIONS.” He opens the door with a retro-tech PUNCH CA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Muzak plays as STEVE and TONY ride down with A FEMALE SHI AGENT.  93 She stares awkwardly at Tony. Steve keeps his hat down. Ding. The doors open. Tony exits, then turns back to Stev

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Good luck with that mission, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Good luck with your project, Doctor. Tony ducks out. The doors close. The Agent turns to Steve

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
dialogues.text: You new here?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Not exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TONY searches HIGH, CROWDED ARCHIVE SHELVES.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Come on, you little hexahedron, where are you hiding? Finally, he spots A HIGH TECH SAFE. He grabs a briefcase, then NANOS A GAUNTLET, FRYING THE SAFE’S LOCK. It opens revealing...THE TESSERACT. Tony smiles.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You may not know it now, but someday you’re going to be a real pain-in-the-ass. Just then...THE ARCHIVE DOOR OPENS.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey, Arnim, you in here? TONY LOCKS THE CUBE IN THE BRIEFCASE JUST BEFORE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOWARD STARK (49) APPEARS, carrying ROSES AND A CAN OF SAUERKRAUT. TONY STARES, STUNNED.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, I’m looking for Dr. Zola. You seen him?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: No. Haven’t seen a soul.  94 Tony stands in front of his father, overwhelmed. Howard looks at him, a bit suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: I know you? From his pocket, TONY GENERATES A BADGE OUT OF NANO-TECH. He holds it out.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: No, sir. Just visiting from MIT.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: That so? Got a name?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Howard...

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Easy to remember-

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Potts.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: I’m Howard Stark. (shaking hands) You seem a little green around the gills, Potts. Need some air?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: That'd be swell. Tony distractedly walks away, leaving the briefcase.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Need the briefcase? PRE-LAP A RINGING PHONE... INT. CAMP LEHIGH, SHIELD FACILITY, PYM’S LAB - DAY (1970) CLOSE ON: AN ANT. A phone continues to ring. Then...

dialogues.speaker: HANK PYM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hello? PULL BACK: THE ANT CRAWLS IN AN ANTFARM ON A LAB SHELF.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER PHONE)
dialogues.text: Dr. Pym?  95

dialogues.speaker: HANK PYM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: That would be the number you called, yes. PAN across the shelf to A CHART OF WASP MATURATION.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER PHONE)
dialogues.text: This is Captain Stevens, from shipping. We have a package for you. KEEP PANNING to A PROTOTYPE ANT-MAN HELMET.

dialogues.speaker: HANK PYM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: So bring it up.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER PHONE)
dialogues.text: That’s the thing, sir, we can’t. ARRIVE ON...HANK PYM (20's), in brown hair and lab coat.

dialogues.speaker: HANK PYM
dialogues.text: Maybe I’m confused. Isn’t that your job?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER PHONE)
dialogues.text: It’s just...sir, the box is glowing. And to be honest, a couple of our mail guys aren’t feeling great-

dialogues.speaker: HANK PYM
dialogues.text: They didn’t open it, did they?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DOOR MARKED, “DR. HENRY PYM," flies open. Hank exits, fuming, brushing past...STEVE. Steve watches Hank stalk off...THEN DUCKS INTO HANK’S LAB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOWARD and TONY step onto AN ELEVATOR. The doors shut.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Sauerkraut and a bouquet...big night planned?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (lifting one at a time) My wife’s expecting. And too much time at the office. Tony puzzles the dates out in his head...

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Congratulations.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: How far along is she?

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Gee, I suppose... (indicating) ...-this far. She’s at the point where she can’t stand the sound of my chewing. So I guess I’1l be eating in the pantry again.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I have a little girl. 96 TONY SMILES. He’s talking about the man-he’s-talking-to’s granddaughter, fifty years before she’s born.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: A girl would be nice. Less chance she'd turn out exactly like me.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Would that be so bad?

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Let’s just say the greater good hasn't always outweighed my own self interest. The elevator doors open. INT. CAMP LEHIGH, SHIELD FACILITY, PYM’S LAB - DAY (1970) STEVE searches Hank’s lab, finally opening the fridge to find...A TRAY OF BRAND NEW PYM PARTICLES.  97

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steve exits Hank’s lab and heads for the elevator. But it opens, revealing THE FEMALE AGENT FROM EARLIER, WITH AN M M.P. You've never seen either of these men before?

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
dialogues.text: No. But I have an eye for this. Something looked fishy. M.P. Describe ‘fishy’.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
dialogues.text: One of them had a hippie beard. M.P. We talking Bee Gees or Mungo Jerry?

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
dialogues.text: Definitely Mungo Jerry. M.P. (over walkie-talkie) This is Chesler. We need every available agent to sub-level 6. We have a potential breach. Steve ducks through the nearest door... INT. CAMP LEHIGH, SHIELD FACILITY, PEGGY’S OFC. - DAY (19 Steve enters a darkened office. A glass wall separates it from another bullpen. Then he sees something on the desk. He stares, stunned, a two photos: one features PEGGY CARTER STANDING WITH JFK. THE OTHER IS OF SKINNY STEVE. Steve turns the desk nameplate around: “MARGARET CARTER.” Steve realizes that even twenty-five years later, Peggy n forgot about him. Just then, THE BULLPEN DOOR FLIES OPEN. LIGHTS SNAP ON, revealing PEGGY CARTER (49), talking to someone in the ha

dialogues.speaker: PEGGY CARTER
dialogues.text: So, send them in.  98

dialogues.speaker: MALE AGENT
dialogues.text: They're trying, ma’am, but Braddock’s unit has been stopped by lightning strikes.

dialogues.speaker: PEGGY CARTER
dialogues.text: Oh, for the love of- I’1ll find the weather projections. You call Braddock and tell him to shelter in place. Assuming he’s bright enough to come out of the rain.

dialogues.speaker: MALE AGENT, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Yes, ma‘am. Steve stares at her from the darkness, STUNNED. Peggy rifles through a file cabinet.

dialogues.speaker: PEGGY CARTER
dialogues.text: Here we are... She flips through a file, reading. In the darkness behind her, Steve approaches. Peggy reads something disturbing.

dialogues.speaker: PEGGY CARTER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Crikey O'Reilly. (calling out) Sergeant? Hang up and call Air Command. Braddock needs back up, immediately.

dialogues.speaker: MALE AGENT
dialogues.text: Ma’ am?

dialogues.speaker: PEGGY CARTER
dialogues.text: Those aren't lightning strikes he’s looking at... She slaps the file closed and hurries out. Steve stares after her a long moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Howard and Tony approach a WAITING LIMO.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Got any names, yet?

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: If it’s a boy, my wife likes Elmonzo.  99

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You might let that stew a while. You've got time.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: What are you, couple years older than me?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Yeah. I guess.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Let me ask you a question. When your kid was born...were you nervous?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Wildly.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Did you feel qualified? Like you had any idea how to successfully operate that thing?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I pieced it together as I went along. I thought about what my dad did...

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: My old man never met a problem he couldn’t solve with a belt.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I tried to hold onto the good stuff. Dad dropped the odd pearl, here and there.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: “No amount of money ever bought a second of time.”

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: That’s good. Smart guy.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: He did his best.  100

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: I tell you, this kid’s not even here yet, but there’s nothing I wouldn't do for him. Tony takes this in, GRATIFIED. Just then...EDWIN JARVIS ( opens the limo door.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Besides, if I fall down on the fathering job, old Jarvis is ready to pick up the slack. Isn’t that right?

dialogues.speaker: EDWIN JARVIS
dialogues.text: Indeed, sir. I shall endeavor to teach the lad the rudiments of judo. Tony smiles at his old friend. As Jarvis gets in the car, Tony notices...STEVE WAITING BEHIND A JEEP. TIME TO GO. Howard turns to shake Tony’s hand.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Well, good to meet you, Potts.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You're going to do fine, Howard.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Thanks. See you around?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Count on it... As he gets into his car, Howard looks to Jarvis.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Have we met him before?

dialogues.speaker: EDWIN JARVIS
dialogues.text: We've met a lot of people, sir.

dialogues.speaker: HOWARD STARK
dialogues.text: Seems very familiar. (beat) Weird beard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sanctuary-2 cruises ominously through space.  101

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHACK! NEBULA GOES TUMBLING ACROSS THE FLOOR. She gets to her knees, looking up at...BAD NEBULA, GLARING DOWN AT HE

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: You’re weak.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: I’m you-

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA RIPS OFF HER TIME-SPACE GPS.
dialogues.text: THEN GAMORA ENTERS. Nebula softens, taking in her (once dead) sister.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: You could stop this. You know you want to. (off Gamora’s look) Did you see what happens in the future? Thanos finds the Soul Stone. MOVE IN ON GAMORA, WHEELS TURNING...

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You want to know how he does that? You want to know what he does to you-

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You disgust me...but that doesn’t mean you’re useless. SHE PRIES OFF THE ORANGE PANEL FROM GOOD NEBULA’S HEAD. Gamora takes in this new development...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Nebula enters to find Thanos on his throne. She hands him Good Nebula’s TIME-SPACE GPS. He smiles.  102 Bad Nebula affixes Good Nebula’s orange panel onto her he

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: How do I look?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE BENATAR approaches Vormir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NATASHA and CLINT stand on the flight deck, staring at TH MAJESTIC, PURPLE PLANET.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Under different circumstances, this would be totally awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clint and Natasha eye THE BENATAR resting on a sand dune. Clint fires a Pym Particle. WHOOSH, THE ENTIRE SHIP DISAPPEARS. CLINT lifts THE SHRUN BENATAR and tucks it in his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Natasha and Clint climb, ragged. They approach AN ARCHWAY

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Really starting to regret my choice here.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Yeah. I’m gonna bet the raccoon didn’t have to climb a mountain.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: I don’t think technically he’s a raccoon...

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Whatever. He eats garbage-  103

dialogues.speaker: HOODED FIGURE
dialogues.text: I assure you, you have nothing to fear from me.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Creepy.

dialogues.speaker: HOODED FIGURE
dialogues.text: Welcome Natasha, daughter of Ivan. Clint, son of Edith.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Creepier.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: RED SKULL
dialogues.text: Consider me a guide. To you, and to all who seek the Soul Stone.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Great. You show us where it is, and we'll be on our way. The figure removes his hood, revealing...THE RED SKULL.

dialogues.speaker: RED SKULL
dialogues.text: Oh, liebchen. If only it were that easy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: START ON JAGGED ROCKS. TILT UP TO SEE SKULL, NATASHA, and CLINT staring down from the ALTAR.

dialogues.speaker: RED SKULL
dialogues.text: What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: The Stone is down there?

dialogues.speaker: RED SKULL
dialogues.text: For one of you. For the other... (smiling it away) The Stone demands a sacrifice. In order to take it, you must leave behind that which you love.  104 SKULL POINTS A BONY FINGER DOWN THE WELL.

dialogues.speaker: RED SKULL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A soul for a soul. Natasha and Clint stare down the well, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: TIME CUT
dialogues.text: RED SKULL STARES DOWN THE WELL, robes whipping in the win

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Maybe he’s full of shit.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: I don’t think so.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Why, because he knew your daddy’s name?

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: I didn’t. (off his look) Thanos left here with the stone, and without his daughter. You really think that’s a coincidence? They both look out at the well, heavy.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (under her breath) Whatever it takes...

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Whatever it takes... Natasha goes to Clint, resolved.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: If we don’t get the stone, billions of people are going to stay dead.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Then I guess we both know who it has to be.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Yeah. Guess we do. They take each other’s hand. A long goodbye beat. Except.  105

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: I'm starting to think we don’t mean the same person.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: For the last five years, I’ve been trying to do one thing -- get to right here. This is all it’s been about. Bringing everybody back.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Do not get all decent on me-

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: You think I want to do it? I’m trying to save your life, you idiot-

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: And I don’t want you to. (beat) Nat. You know what I’ve done. What I am now. Your life’s worth ten of mine-

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: I don’t judge people by their worst mistakes-—

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Maybe you should-

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: You didn’t. That stops him. He looks in her eyes, then down, giving i She

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: You're a pain in my ass, you know that? relaxes for the briefest moment. Just then, CLINT SWEEPS HER LEGS, PINNING HER DOWN.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tell my family I love them. REVERSES, SENDING HIM TUMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Tell them yourself. FIRES A WIDOW’S BITE INTO HIS CHEST AND MAKES A BREAK FOR CLIFF. SHE’S HALFWAY THERE WHEN...  106 BOOM! AN EXPLODING ARROW KNOCKS HER OFF HER FEET. Clint races past her...leaping off edge of the cliff. Jus as he falls... NATASHA TACKLES HIM IN MID-AIR. They drop, but NATASHA SHOOTS HER GRAPPLING LINE INTO THE CLIFF. THEY SLAM INTO THE CLIFFSIDE. She attaches the other end her grappling line to Clint’s belt...saving his life. She slides, but he reaches out and grabs her...saving her

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Damn you. They hang there a long, terrible moment. CLINT’S GRASP STARTS TO LOOSEN. Finally, she looks him in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: Let me go.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: No. Please no... The two friends stare at each other, a lifetime between t

dialogues.speaker: NATASHA
dialogues.text: It’s okay...

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Natasha, no- Then Natasha Romanoff kicks off the cliff wall, yanking o of Clint’s grasp. She falls... Clint dangles from the grappling hook, staring down, helpless, stifling his scream. WHOOSH! THE WHOLE WORLD GOES WHITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the light fades, CLINT LIES FLOATING IN SPACE. The camera rotates until we see...IT’S A REFLECTION OF THE SK CLINT LIES IN THE POOL AT THE BASE OF THE MOUNTAIN. He si up and opens his hand to see THE SOUL STONE. His eyes wel  107

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone looks around, exhausted. Amazed.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: Are you telling me that actually worked?

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Did we get them all? CLINT DROPS TO HIS KNEES. Steve turns, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Clint? Are you okay? Clint stares, haunted. SMART HULK realizes...

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Where’s Nat? (everyone stares) WHERE’S NAT?! Clint looks up at them, eyes glassy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMART HULK, eyes red, stands beside a bench on the dock. Behind him, STEVE, TONY, THOR, AND CLINT STARE OUT, GRIEV

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Do we know if she had family?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Yeah. Us. Thor turns, thrown.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Why are you doing that?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I’m just asking a question-  108

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Why are we talking as if she’s dead? We have the stones. Bring her back. C’mon, stop this shit. Clint squeezes away tears.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: We can’t get her back.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: What’s he talking about? Of course, we can.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: It can’t be undone. That’s why.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: No offense, but you’re...a very earthly being. We're talking about space magic, here. “Can’t” seems a little definitive, don’t you think?

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Well, I know I’m a little outside my pay grade here, but, she still isn’t here, is she?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: That's my point-

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: It can’t be undone. At least that’s what the red, floating guy said. But why don’t you go talk to him, okay? Why don’t you grab your hammer and fly to that place and talk to him. IT CAN’T BE UNDONE. (beat) It was supposed to be me. She sacrificed her life for that goddamn stone. She bet her life on it. That lands heavily on all of them. A moment passes. THEN SMART HULK HURLS THE BENCH INTO THE WATER. It skips across the surface like a stone.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: She’s not coming back. We have to make it worth it. We have to.  109

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: We will. PULL BACK, LEAVING OUR MOURNERS IN TABLEAU...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL SIX INFINITY STONES rest behind safety glass. SOON, ROBOTIC ARMS ENTER FRAME, PLUCKING UP THE POWER STONE. TONY operates the arms as ROCKET and SMART HULK watch. The robot arms swing the stone over to...A NEW IRON MAN

dialogues.speaker: GAUNTLET. NANO-TECH SHIFTS AND SLIDES, HOLDING IT IN PLAC
dialogues.text: Smart Hulk releases a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: TIME CUT
dialogues.text: THE COMPLETED GAUNTLET sits in a cradle, SIX INFINITY STO EMBEDDED IN THE BACK. Pull back to find... SCOTT, THOR, CLINT, RHODEY, and STEVE watching TONY AND ROCKET FINE TUNE THE GLOVE.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: All right. The glove’s ready. Question is, who’s gonna snap their freaking fingers? Everyone stares a beat. Then, THOR REACHES FOR THE GAUNTL

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I'll do it.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, what are you doing-

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Thor, we haven’t decided who's putting that on.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Oh. Were all of you just waiting for the right opportunity?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: Maybe I was getting around to it-

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: We should at least discuss it-  110

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Staring at the thing isn’t going to bring everybody back, is it? Look, I’m the strongest Avenger. It’s my responsibility. Fate wills it so.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Hold on, hold on-

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Stop it! Let me do this. Let me do something good. Something right-

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: That thing is channeling enough energy to light up a continent. You’re in no condition-

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: What do you think is coursing through my veins right now?

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: Cheez Whiz?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Lightning. Smart Hulk steps toward the Gauntlet.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Lightning won’t help you, pal. It’s gotta be me. (approaching) You saw what those stones did to Thanos. They almost killed him. None of you could survive.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: And how do we know you can?

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: We don’t. But the radiation’s mostly gamma. (beat) It’s like I was made for this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE QUANTUM TUNNEL LIES IN DARKNESS. Then, clack, the lig come on, revealing... NEBULA, STARING UP AT THE WAITING MACHINE.  111

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMART HULK STUDIES THE GAUNTLET. The moment of truth.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Good to go?

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Let's do it.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Okay, remember, everyone Thanos snapped away five years ago, you're just bringing them back...to today. Don’t change anything from the last five years. Got it?

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Got it. PAN AROUND as the Avengers ready themselves: STEVE steps forward, shield on his arm. SCOTT deploys his helmet. RHODEY readies his repulsors. ROCKET covers his raccoon junk and hides behind THOR. TON armors up, then nanos a shield to protect CLINT beside hi

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Friday, why don’t you go ahead and activate Barn Door Protocol? STEEL DOORS SLIDE SHUT ALL AROUND THE WORKSHOP. FINALLY, SMART HULK HOLDS UP THE GAUNTLET.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Everybody’s coming home...

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: What’s happening? Take it off, take if off!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Bruce, you okay?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Talk to me, Banner.  112

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: I’m...okay...

dialogues.speaker: CRAAAACK
dialogues.text: UP SMART HULK’'S ARM. HE ROARS AS HIS EYES BLAZE GREEN. A BLAST WHITES OUT THE SCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEBULA studies THE QUANTUM CONSOLE. She takes off her glo revealing A PERFECTLY INTACT ARM. THIS IS BAD NEBULA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INTO THE CONSOLE. THE QUANTUM TUNNEL boots up. AS SHE HURRIES AWAY...

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK COLLAPSES, ARM WITHERED, SIDE BURNT BLACK.
dialogues.text: EVERYONE RUSHES OVER. Steve checks Smart Hulk’s pulse.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Bruce!

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Don’t move him! Then THE BLAST DOORS OPEN, revealing the sound of...CHIRP SCOTT walks toward the courtyard. Smart Hulk’s eyes clear. He grasps Steve’s arm.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Did it work? They pause, as if it only just now occurred to them. JUST THEN...A CELL PHONE BUZZES.  113 A STUNNED CLINT TURNS AND APPROACHES HIS PHONE. On the ho screen, we see A PHOTO OF HIS WIFE: “LAURA CALLING.” CLINT FINALLY PUTS THE PHONE TO HIS EAR.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Honey?

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Guys, I think it- BOOM! THE BUILDING EXPLODES. DEBRIS SWALLOWS THE CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing moves. The smoke clears, revealing...A BOMBED OUT CRATER A MILE WIDE. Avengers Compound has been destroyed. Then the light changes...AND THE SANCTUARY-2 parts the clouds. It hovers over the ruins like a vulture. AN ENERGY BEAM drops to the ground, releasing... THANOS, FLANKED BY A SQUAD OF OUTRIDERS. The Mad Titan lo around at the devastation he has wrought.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Daughter?

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: Yes, father... OUT OF THE SMOKE WALKS “BAD” NEBULA. Bruised and dirty.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: So this is the future. Well done. She tears off THE ORANGE HEAD-PLATE.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: Thank you, Father. They suspected nothing.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: The arrogant never do.  114 Thanos takes off his helmet, staring up at the crater’s e

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go. Find the stones. Bring them to me.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: What will you do?

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: Wait.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: Canopy! Canopy! Rhodey’s suit RATCHETS OPEN. HE HAULS HIMSELF FREE to see...ROCKET TRAPPED UNDER RUBBLE. AS HE CRAWLS TO HIM...

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Mayday! Tony. Cap. Does anybody hear me?! HE FINALLY REACHES ROCKET. Rocket wheezes, in pain.

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY WEDGES A PIECE OF REBAR INTO THE DEBRIS. HE HEAVES
dialogues.text: finally managing to lever it off of Rocket. THEN...

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Mayday! Mayday! We are taking on water!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON SCOTT LANG lying on a SILVER, METAL FLOOR.  115

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: ...anyone...Mayday...Mayday- Scott groans, coming to.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Wait, what...?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: Tell ‘em to...hurry...asses up-

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: .-.trapped...drowning...no time... Scott jumps to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: No! Wait, I’m here! Scott spots WATER TRICKLING THROUGH THE CRACKED FLOOR.

dialogues.speaker: WATER DRIPS FROM A HOLE IN THE ROOF OF AN ACCESS
dialogues.text: TUNNEL...ONTO CLINT BARTON, LYING FACEDOWN. He groans. He opens his hand to find HIS CELLPHONE: HIS WIFE SMILES THE SCREEN. “LAURA, ONE MISSED CALL.” Clint stares, amaze He winces, finding he’s been lying atop...THE GAUNTLET. I bashed out of shape, BUT ALL SIX STONES STILL GLEAM.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Cap? Stark? Anyone? STATIC. Then, he hears...A SCRAPING SOUND, TALONS ON CEME He peers down a darkened tunnel, then unshoulders his bow HE LOOSES A FLARE ARROW, revealing...

dialogues.speaker: FIRES SMOULDER BENEATH THE COLLAPSED CEILING. MOVE THROUG
dialogues.text: SMOKE TO FIND...STEVE, out cold. SOMEONE SHAKES HIM. He wakes to see TONY, HOLDING HIS SHIELD.  116

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You lose this again, I’m keeping it.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Told you. We messed with time. Time messed back. Woozy, Steve follows Tony through the ruins of the lab.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Where are the others?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: I read life signs, maybe 800 feet down, but it’s hard to tell. They reach the edge of the crater where THOR LOOKS DOWN AT...THANOS. Sitting on a rock. Waiting.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What’s he been doing?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Absolutely nothing. The three of them stare a long moment. Then, as if sensin them, Thanos turns his head...AND LOOKS THEIR WAY.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Where are the stones?

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Somewhere under all of this. All I know is...he doesn’t have ‘em.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: So we keep it that way. That lands. This is their chance.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: You know it’s a trap. TONY DEPLOYS HIS ARMOR.  117

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Don’t think I care.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Just so we're all in agreement. Thor holds out his hand: MJOLNIR FLIES INTO IT. He holds his other hand: STORMBREAKER SLAPS INTO HIS PALM. CRACK! LIGHTNING STRIKES AS HE’S COVERED IN CAPE AND ARMO

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let’s kill him properly this time. STEVE TIGHTENS HIS SHIELD, LEADING THEM INTO THE CRATER..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanos sits on his rock, contemplative.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: You could not live with your own failure. And where did that bring you? Right back to me. TONY APPROACHES, WARY, AS IF SNEAKING UP ON A RABID DOG. STEVE AND THOR FAN OUT ON EITHER SIDE.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I thought by eliminating half of life, the other half would thrive. But you’ve shown me that’s impossible. (beat) Life clings to the past with bloody fingernails. As long as there are those who remember what was, there will be those unable to accept what can be. They will resist.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Yep. We’re all kinds of stubborn.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: I’m thankful. Because now I know what I must do. Thanos reaches for his helmet.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I will shred this universe down to its last atom. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And then, with the stones you've collected for me, create a new one, teeming with life that knows not what it has lost, but only what it has been given. A grateful universe.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Born out of blood. Thanos studies Steve as if seeing him for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: They'll never know it. THANOS DRAWS A BLADE OFF HIS BACK, TOWERING OVER THEM.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Because you won’t be alive to tell them. Tony glances over at Steve. Ready? Steve nods...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEBULA huddles alone in A PRISON CELL. After a beat...THE DOORS RATCHET OPEN. She stares into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: In the future...what happens to you and me?

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: I try to kill you. Several times. But, eventually...we become friends. We become sisters.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: That’s hard to believe.  119

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: A lot of things that happen will be hard to believe. Gamora nearly smiles. She takes a long look at Nebula. Finally...SHE HOLDS OUT HER HAND.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Come on. We can still stop him. Nebula takes a deciding moment. Then SHE GRABS GAMORA’S HAND. One sister pulls the other to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Rhodey. Rocket. Get out of here. Save yourselves. ROCKET SURFACES FROM BELOW, GASPING.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: No good. Couldn’t even...find a hole...small enough to abandon you through. Suddenly, Smart Hulk snarls in pain as THE CEILING DROPS FOOT. His legs buckle as he struggles against the weight. Finally he sets his jaw...AND STRAIGHTENS HIS LEGS.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: HANG ON! I’M COMING!  120

dialogues.speaker: AFFIXES ARROW-CHARGES TO THE WALLS AS HE RUNS.
dialogues.text: Just as the Outriders are about to overtake him, Clint hi button on his bow, DETONATING THE CHARGES... BRINGING THE ROOF DOWN ON TOP OF THE OUTRIDERS. Clint rolls, coming up directly underneath A VERTICAL SHA A cluster of Outriders escape the collapse, lunging for h Clint shoots a grappling arrow up the shaft, ascending... SO DO THE OUTRIDERS, skittering up the sides. Clint draws his katana, slashing the aliens just as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE TUMBLES INTO THE UPPER CHAMBER. He gasps, safe. Then h looks up to see (BAD) NEBULA, LOOMING OVER HIM.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: Oh, hey. I know you. She gently takes the Gauntlet.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Father. I have the stones.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: What- Clint tries to get up, but Nebula puts a boot in his ches and A BLASTER TO HIS HEAD...

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Stop.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: You're betraying us?

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Not you. GOOD NEBULA steps from the shadows, hands raised, placati Bad Nebula stares at her future self.  121

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: You don’t have to do this.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: I am this.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: No. You’re not. Good Nebula takes a tiny step forward. She taps her head.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: You’ve seen what we become-

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: Sister, listen to her-

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: Shut up. You're a traitor!

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: You can change. Bad Nebula struggles, her face a twisted grimace.

dialogues.speaker: BAD NEBULA
dialogues.text: He won’t let me.

dialogues.speaker: AND SHOOTS HER DOWN. BAD NEBULA DROPS.
dialogues.text: Good Nebula stares at her dead younger self, conflicted. Clint picks up the gauntlet, very confused.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: I’m not even gonna ask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TONY’S HUD: TONY GLARES RIGHT AT US, AS...

dialogues.speaker: MJOLNIR PLOWS INTO THE DIRT. TONY GOES TUMBLING, OUT COLD
dialogues.text: TONY’S HUD: FRIDAY TRIES TO REVIVE HIM.

dialogues.speaker: FRIDAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Boss? Wake up!

dialogues.speaker: RHODEY
dialogues.text: See you on the other side, man. They take a last breath, THEN THE WATER HITS THE CEILING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steve slashes at Thanos. The Titan brutally bats him asid Thor attacks, but Thanos drives him through walls of debr THANOS SMASHES HIS FIST INTO THOR’S FACE, OVER AND OVER. Thor calls for Stormbreaker, but Thanos intercepts it. He presses the blade into Thor’s chest, trying to drive it h Then, across the field...MJOLNIR RISES INTO THE AIR.

dialogues.speaker: IN, KNOCKING THE AXE OUT OF HIS HAND.
dialogues.text: Follow the hammer as it flies back to the only other man worthy enough to wield it...STEVE ROGERS. Half-conscious, THOR SEES STEVE HOLDING MJOLNIR.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I...knew...it...

dialogues.speaker: BEFORE THE TITAN CAN GET UP, STEVE CALLS DOWN THE LIGHTNI
dialogues.text: AND SENDS IT CRACKLING INTO THANOS’ BODY. Steve leaps, trying to finish Thanos off...BUT THANOS ROL ASIDE, HEAD-BUTTING STEVE BACKWARDS. THANOS GETS TO HIS FEET, A FAINT SMILE ON HIS FACE. HE WHIPS OFF HIS HELMET AND ATTACKS STEVE WITH HIS BLADE. BLOW AFTER BLOW. IT’S ALL STEVE CAN DO TO GET HIS SHIELD  123

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE FIELD.
dialogues.text: Steve lies beaten, half a shield still attached to his ar

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: In all my years of conquest... Thanos looks out at the tiny human struggling to stand.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Of violence and slaughter...it was never personal. Thanos gestures behind him as A RUMBLE ECHOES.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But I’1l tell you now, the things I’m about to do to your stubborn, annoying, little planet...

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m going to enjoy it. Very, very much. Steve stares at Thanos and his army. And even in the face such overwhelming odds...he gets to his feet. THANOS stares, almost sad, as Steve tightens the broken shield on his arm...AND STARTS WALKING TOWARD HIM. One man against thousands. All alone. But just then, Steve’s COM CRACKLES. He strains to hear. The com crackles again. We can make out A MUFFLED VOICE.

dialogues.speaker: MUFFLED VOICE, (ON COM)
dialogues.text: -ap-...-comin-...-ot- Steve shakes his head, trying to clear it. Slowly, SOUND

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Cap. On your left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 124 Steve watches Sam soar over the field, then turns AS EVEN MORE PORTALS OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: PARKER...AND KRAGLIN AND THE RAVAGERS.
dialogues.text: FROM ANOTHER: T’CHALLA, OKOYE, SHURI, M’BAKU, WANDA, BUCK GROOT...AND THE WAKANDAN ARMY.

dialogues.speaker: AND WONG LEADING A SQUAD OF SORCERERS.
dialogues.text: THOR gets to his feet, calling Stormbreaker to his hand as...TONY regains consciousness, staring out at the caval Wong and Strange quickly find each other.

dialogues.speaker: DR. STRANGE
dialogues.text: Is that everyone?

dialogues.speaker: WONG
dialogues.text: You wanted more?!

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Top floor, everybody out!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Avengers...assemble.

dialogues.speaker: GIANT-MAN SLUGS A LEVIATHAN IN THE JAW.
dialogues.text: DRAX launches himself onto a CULL currently choking the l out of KORG.  125 TONY blasts overhead. RESCUE joins him. Together, they strafe the field. STEVE and THOR fight together. Both hold out their hands. Stormbreaker returns to Steve, Mjolnir to Thor, who frown

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: No. You take the little one. Elsewhere, TONY BATTLES SEVERAL CULLS. One knocks him int an Outrider, who’s about to rip his armor off when... THWIP. PETER PARKER webs the Outrider, yanking him into t path of...GIANT-MAN’S FOOT. SQUISH. Tony stares at Peter, emotional. They retract their helme

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: Mr. Stark. Holy cow, you would not believe what’s been going on. Do you remember when we were in space? And I got all dusty? I must’ve passed out, because I woke up and you weren’t there, but Dr. Strange was, and he was like, “it’s been five years, they need us.” And he started doing that yellow sparkly thing he does-— But Tony just wraps his arms around him, smashing Peter’s face into his chest plate.

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (muffled) Oh. This is nice. ACROSS THE FIELD...QUILL flies, firing down on Sakaaran soldiers. One leaps off an outcropping...

dialogues.speaker: SAKAARAN WAITS.
dialogues.text: Quill drops one, but the other raises his weapon to strik THEN BLAM! The Sakaaran drops dead on top of Quill. He pushes the body off to see...GAMORA, BLASTER STILL SMOKING. Quill stares, amazed.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: Gamora? HE APPROACHES, OVERWHELMED, EMOTIONAL.  126

dialogues.speaker: QUILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I thought I lost you. He tenderly strokes her face...and she knees him in the n Twice. He goes down, gasping.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You missed the first time...then you got ‘em both the second time. She stares down at him as...NEBULA JOINS HER.

dialogues.speaker: GAMORA
dialogues.text: This is the one? Seriously?

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: Your choices were him or a tree.

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE FIELD...CLINT RUNS WITH THE GAUNTLET, PURSUED
dialogues.text: CHITAURI APE. Just before the ape tramples Clint... SAM WILSON SWOOPS IN, CUTTING THE CREATURE DOWN. Clint runs on. The heroes confer over coms.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: What do you want to do with this thing?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Get those stones as far away as possible!

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: No! We need to send them back where they came from.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: There’s no way to send them back. Thanos destroyed our time machine.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Hold on! (shrinking to normal size) That wasn’t our only time machine. He clicks the KEYS TO LUIS’ VAN. From a distance, we hear “LA CUCARACHA.” Steve immediately gets it.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Does anyone see an ugly, brown van out there? ABOVE, VALKYRIE SCANS THE FIELD FROM HER PEGASUS.  127

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: Yeah. But you’re not going to like where it’s parked. LUIS’ VAN SITS SURROUNDED BY THOUSANDS OF ALIENS, DEEP BE ENEMY LINES.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Scott, how long do you need to get that thing working?

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Uh, maybe ten minutes.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Get it started. We’1ll get the stones to you.

dialogues.speaker: HOPE VAN DYNE
dialogues.text: We're on it, Cap. SCOTT glances at her. Cap? THEY SHRINK DOWN AND FLY AWAY. TONY FLIES UP TO DR. STRANGE, HOVERING.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Doc. You said we win one in 14 million. Is this how it goes down?

dialogues.speaker: DR. STRANGE
dialogues.text: If I tell you what happens, it won’t happen.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: You better be right. Tony rockets away. Strange coolly watches him go. ACROSS THE FIELD...EBONY MAW RUSHES TO THANOS.

dialogues.speaker: EBONY MAW
dialogues.text: Sire, the stones!

dialogues.speaker: CARRYING THE GAUNTLET.
dialogues.text: A CULL HAMMERS CLINT, BUT THEN...T’CHALLA SLASHES THE CUL T’CHALLA Clint, give it to me.  128 CLINT HANDS THE GAUNTLET TO T’CHALLA, WHO TUCKS IT AND RU

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE FIELD...SCOTT AND HOPE FLY OVER A LONG PLATOON
dialogues.text: CHITAURI, TOWARD LUIS’ VAN. INT./EXT LUIS’ VAN - CONTINUOUS They GROW TO NORMAL SIZE in the front seat. Out the windshield, THANOS’ HORDE CHARGES AT THEIR FRIENDS.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: (digging around) Ignition’s broken. I/’11 hotwire it-

dialogues.speaker: HOPE VAN DYNE
dialogues.text: Wait, you know how to do that? Scott splices wires. Sparks fly.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: I was in prison. I know how to do a lot of things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T’'CHALLA RACES THROUGH THE HORDE...BUT THEN THANOS KNOCK OFF HIS FEET. THE GAUNTLET GOES TUMBLING. AS THANOS MOVES IN ON T’CHALLA...ALL AROUND, WRECKAGE BEG TO FLOAT. THANOS LOOKS UP TO SEE... WANDA, HOVERING IN THE AIR, WAITING FOR HIM.

dialogues.speaker: WANDA
