dialogues.text: You took everything from me. Thanos takes THE BLADE off his back.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: I don’t even know who you are.

dialogues.speaker: WANDA
dialogues.text: You will.

dialogues.speaker: HIM. AS THANOS FIGHTS HIS WAY THROUGH IT...
dialogues.text: T’'CHALLA DIVES FOR THE FALLEN GAUNTLET. SUDDENLY...EBONY MANIPULATES THE EARTH, PULLING THE GAUNTLET TOWARD HIM. T’CHALLA WRAPS HIMSELF AROUND THE GLOVE, GETTING DRAGGED.  129

dialogues.speaker: I GOT IT
dialogues.text: T’CHALLA TURNS TO SEE PETER WHIZZING PAST. HE HURLS THE GAUNTLET...THWIP! Peter snatches it out of the air. HE LANDS, ONLY TO FIND HIMSELF SURROUNDED BY OUTRIDERS.

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Activate instant kill! His robotic arms slash with expert precision.

dialogues.speaker: ARMOR OFF IN PIECES, THEN SLAMS HIM BACK TO THE GROUND.
dialogues.text: Thanos groans, outmatched.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Rain fire. Wipe them all out. CORVUS GLAIVE FIGHTS GROOT.

dialogues.speaker: CORVUS GLAIVE
dialogues.text: But, sire, our troops-

dialogues.speaker: THANOS, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Just do it!

dialogues.speaker: HIGH ABOVE...THE SANCTUARY-2 DESCENDS, CANNONS OPENING UP
dialogues.text: BELOW...WANDA looks up, raising a force field just as...

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER POTTS, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: Um, is anyone else seeing this? TONY, SMART HULK, AND GAMORA turn to see...WATER GUSHING THE RIVERBANK THREATENS TO COLLAPSE. SUDDENLY...

dialogues.speaker: STRANGE AND WONG CONJURE TWO HUGE RUNE SHIELDS TO SHORE U
dialogues.text: THE BANK. MORE WIZARDS JOIN, CREATING A HUGE “RUNE LEVEE. THE SANCTUARY-2 MAINTAINS ITS BARRAGE. ACROSS THE FIELD...STEVE spots PETER PARKER gradually bei overwhelmed by Outriders.  130

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: I got this...I got this...I don’t got this.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Hey, Queens! Heads up!

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER POTTS
dialogues.text: Hang on, kid. I’ve got you. She drags him above the fray, then tosses him to...VALKYR FLYING PAST. PETER PERCHES ATOP PEGASUS.

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: Hey, nice to meet you-aaaaarg!

dialogues.speaker: HEROES. ALL HOPE IS LOST.
dialogues.text: Rocket and Groot dive for cover. Groot wraps his branches around them both.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: At least we’re going out together this time...

dialogues.speaker: COVER TO SEE...THE CANNONS SWIVELING UP_ TOWARD THE CLOUD
dialogues.text: SAM WILSON flies overhead.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: What the hell is this? TONY’S HUD: TONY FLIES OVERHEAD, SEARCHING UPWARD.

dialogues.speaker: TONY
dialogues.text: Friday, what are they firing at?

dialogues.speaker: FRIDAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Something just entered the upper atmosphere.  131 Rocket looks up at...A COMET HEADING STRAIGHT FOR EARTH.

dialogues.speaker: GROOT
dialogues.text: (nervous ) I am Groot. Rocket grins, knowing what’s coming.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: Just wait for it. SUDDENLY, THE COMET VEERS...RIGHT TOWARD THE SHIP.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (OVER COM)
dialogues.text: Danvers! We’re gonna need an assist down here!

dialogues.speaker: CAROL DANVERS, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: (under ragged breath) Roger...Rogers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scott twists wires on the Quantum Tunnel, hotwiring it.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG, (INTO COM)
dialogues.text: I’m almost there. Where’s the glove?

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: Uh, hey. I’m Peter Parker.

dialogues.speaker: CAROL DANVERS
dialogues.text: Hey, Peter Parker. You got something for me?  132 Peter hands it over, staring out at the approaching horde

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: I don’t know how you’re gonna get it through all that-

dialogues.speaker: WANDA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Don’t worry, kid... Peter turns to see...

dialogues.speaker: WANDA, OKOYE, GAMORA, NEBULA, VALKYRIE, HOPE, AND SHURI
dialogues.text: WAITING. Wanda’s hands begin to glow.

dialogues.speaker: OKOYE
dialogues.text: She’s got help. Carol glances at PEPPER and MANTIS, then tucks the gauntl under her arm AND LEADS THEM OUT. AT THE RIDGE...Thanos spots THE WOMEN OF MARVEL BLASTING THROUGH HIS TROOPS. HE TRACKS THEIR PATH TO...THE VAN.

dialogues.speaker: SCOTT LANG
dialogues.text: Thirty seconds! Thanos understands immediately. HE GRABS PROXIMA’S SPEAR FROM HER, AND STARTS RUNNING...

dialogues.speaker: JUST YARDS AWAY FROM THE GOAL.
dialogues.text: SHE PUTS HER HEAD DOWN, FLYING FOR ALL SHE’S WORTH. BUT J AS SHE REACHES THE GAPING VAN DOORS... THANOS THROWS THE SPEAR...

dialogues.speaker: TAKING OUT SOME OF THE WIZARDS HOLDING BACK THE RIVER.
dialogues.text: THANOS CATCHES PROXIMA’S RETURNING SPEAR.  133

dialogues.speaker: LYING UNGUARDED IN THE DIRT.
dialogues.text: The problem is...SO DOES THANOS.

dialogues.speaker: CAROL ARRIVES. SHE GRABS THE GLOVE, PREVENTING HIM FROM
dialogues.text: CLOSING HIS FIST. HE HEADBUTTS HER...BUT SHE DOESN’T MOVE CAROL PRESSES THANOS DOWN, BUT BEFORE HE FALLS...

dialogues.speaker: CAROL, SENDING HER FLYING.
dialogues.text: THE FIELD GOES QUIET. NOW, NOTHING STANDS IN THANOS’ WAY. Tony gets to his knees, realizing... The Avengers are going to lose. ACROSS THE FIELD...WATER STARTS TO SPILL INTO THE CRATER. STRANGE TRIES TO HOLD IT BACK...BUT IT’S A LOSING BATTLE. looks to Tony... Tony meets his eye. And in that moment, all Strange can d is hold up a single finger. “One.”

dialogues.speaker: GAUNTLET. JUST AS THE ENERGY SURGES THROUGH HIM...
dialogues.text: TONY LUNGES FOR THE GAUNTLET IN THANOS’ HAND, NANO-CLAMPI IT IN A VISE. THANOS KNOCKS HIM ASIDE. HE LIFTS HIS HAND IN THE AIR, TRIUMPHANT.

dialogues.speaker: THANOS
dialogues.text: I am...inevitable. THANOS SNAPS HIS FINGERS. But nothing happens. Confused, Thanos turns the glove over to find...THE STONES ARE GONE He looks to see...TONY, NANO-PARTICLES SLIDING AND SHIFTI

dialogues.speaker: FORMING A NEW GAUNTLET ON HIS OWN WRIST
TONY
dialogues.text: And I...am Iron Man.

dialogues.speaker: LEAVING THANOS STANDING ALONE. AFTER A LONG MOMENT, HE SI
dialogues.text: DOWN ON A ROCK...AND ACCEPTS HIS FATE. He watches as... HIS ATOMS DISSOLVE. FINALLY, THANOS DISAPPEARS. ACROSS THE FIELD, QUILL turns to GAMORA...BUT FINDS HER G

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: Babe? Gamora?

dialogues.speaker: ROOTS OF A TREE, ARMOR SMOKING, ARM WITHERED AND BLACKENE
dialogues.text: Dying. RHODEY RUSHES TO HIM, BUT WITH ONE LOOK, HE KNOWS IT’S TO LATE. TONY EXHALES, ALMOST LETTING GO. Then... PETER PARKER lands, kneeling, taking Tony’s hand.

dialogues.speaker: PETER PARKER
dialogues.text: Mr. Stark...Tony...it’s okay, it’s okay...Mr. Stark, we won. You did it, sir... But Tony gazes past him. Rhodey puts his hand on Peter’s shoulder, guiding him away... AS PEPPER ARRIVES. She kneels, heartsick.

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER POTTS
dialogues.text: Hey, Friday, what've we got?

dialogues.speaker: FRIDAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Life functions critical. Pepper stares into her husband's eyes...and knows.  135

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER POTTS
dialogues.text: Tony, look at me. We’re going to be okay... He stares at her, tears welling. I’m sorry. She touches his face, then leans in to kiss him.

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER POTTS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You can rest now. When she pulls back, she sees his eyes, fixed and glassy. Everything goes quiet. All around, OUR HEROES GATHER, the full weight of what’s happened dawning on them. Tony Stark is gone. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER PARKER enters a hallway teeming with students. He searches the crowd, finally finding...NED LEEDS. As they embrace...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fireworks explode over the skyline of San Francisco.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Everybody wants a happy ending. But it doesn’t always roll that way. Maybe this time. On Cassie’s porch, SCOTT watches with HOPE and CASSIE, al them grinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO BIKES lean on the porch of THE BARTON FARM HOUSE. The the front door opens...and COOPER and LILA BARTON step ou

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I'm hoping if you play this back, it’s in celebration. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I hope families are reunited, I hope we get it back and something like a normal version of the planet has been restored. If there ever was such a thing. She looks up at...A QUINJET descending from the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE PALACE BALCONY...T’CHALLA embraces his mother, RAMONDA. Shuri turns from them to the magnificent sunset.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: God, what a world. Universe, now. If you'd told me ten years ago that we weren’t alone, let alone to this extent, I probably wouldn’t have been surprised. But come on...

dialogues.speaker: EXT BARTON HOME
dialogues.text: The Quinjet touches down. The rear jump door opens, revealing CLINT. He stares at Lila and Cooper, overwhelme

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Who knew what epic forces of dark and light would come into play? For better or worse, that’s the reality our children get to grow up in. They throw themselves into his arms. He kisses their head tears in his eyes. Finally, he looks up to see... LAURA BARTON, beaming, tearful, holding THREE YEAR-OLD NATHANIEL’S HAND. Clint gathers them all into a hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HOLOGRAM of TONY STARK projects from an IRON MAN HELMET the table.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: That’s why I thought I’d probably better record a little greeting, in the case of..an untimely death on my part. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I mean, death at any time is untimely, but...this “time travel” thing we’re going to try to pull off tomorrow has me scratching my head about the “survivability” of it all. But that’s the hero gig, right? Part of the journey is the end. REVERSE to find PEPPER, MORGAN, HAPPY HOGAN, RHODEY, THOR STEVE, SMART HULK, and CLINT, all dressed in black, watch

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What am I even tripping for? Everything is going to work out exactly the way it’s supposed to. HOLO TONY seems to look out at the gathered heroes...and Morgan in particular.

dialogues.speaker: TONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I love you 3000. He switches off the camera, vanishing. Tears streaming, Pepper kisses Morgan’s forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEPPER and MORGAN slowly descend the stairs, carrying an RINGED WITH FLOWERS. The Avengers follow, somber.

dialogues.speaker: PEPPER RESTS THE FLOWERS ON THE WATER.
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON THE RT: “Proof That Tony Stark Has A Heart.” Pull back, past Morgan and HAPPY HOGAN... PAST STEVE, SAM, RHODEY, AND WANDA... PAST CLINT, LAURA, LILA, COOPER, and NATHANIEL... PAST THOR AND SMART HULK... PAST SCOTT, HOPE, HANK PYM, and JANET VAN DYNE... PAST PETER PARKER and AUNT MAY... PAST T’CHALLA, OKOYE, and SHURI,  138 PAST STRANGE and WONG... PAST QUILL, NEBULA, GROOT, MANTIS, and ROCKET... PAST BUCKY BARNES... PAST SECRETARY ROSS and HARLEY KEENER... PAST MARIA HILL, CAROL DANVERS, and, finally, NICK FURY. THE MOURNERS MOVE TO THE EDGE OF THE LAKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LATER...CLINT looks out at the lake. WANDA approaches.

dialogues.speaker: CLINT BARTON
dialogues.text: I just wish there were some way I could let her know that we won. That we did it.

dialogues.speaker: WANDA
dialogues.text: She knows. They both do. Clint puts his arm around her. They stare out at the wate

dialogues.speaker: EXT. STARK ECO-COMPOUND, PORCH/BACK STAIRS- DAY
dialogues.text: ON THE PORCH, HAPPY HOGAN HOLDS MORGAN’S HAND.

dialogues.speaker: HAPPY HOGAN
dialogues.text: How are you doing, squirt? You hungry?

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN STARK
dialogues.text: Uh, huh.

dialogues.speaker: HAPPY HOGAN
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN STARK
dialogues.text: Cheeseburgers? Happy takes a beat, choked up. Like father like daughter.

dialogues.speaker: HAPPY HOGAN
dialogues.text: Did you know your dad liked cheeseburgers?

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN STARK
dialogues.text: No, I didn’t know that.  139

dialogues.speaker: HAPPY HOGAN
dialogues.text: I’m going to get you all the cheeseburgers you want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOR and VALKYRIE look down on NEW ASGARD.

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: So when can we expect you back?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: About that...

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: Thor, your people need a king.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: They already have one. And she’s a far better king than I could ever be.

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: Are you serious?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: It’s time to be who I am, rather than who I’m supposed to be. And a leader is who you are. She processes this. Does she want it? She does.

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: You know, I’d make a lot of changes around here.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I’m counting on it, Your Majesty. Emotional, Val finally SHAKES HIS HAND.

dialogues.speaker: VALKYRIE
dialogues.text: What will you do?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: I’m not entirely sure. For the first time in a thousand years, I have no path. (beat) But I do have a ride. REVEAL...THE BENATAR parked behind them, Rocket alongside  140

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: Move it or lose it, Hairbag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOR drops his duffle bag on the deck of the Benatar. QUI MANTIS, DRAX, NEBULA, and ROCKET ready the engines.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Home sweet home. Tree! Good to see you. The Asgardians of the Galaxy, together again. He settles beside Quill, who holomaps their course.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: All right, where first? He swipes through images on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: You know, I’m still in charge, here, right?

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Of course. Of course... Thor swipes the map again.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: See, when you keep swiping my map, that sounds kind of like, “of course, I know you think you're still in charge-"

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: Quail, that’s your own insecurities bubbling up.

dialogues.speaker: DRAX
dialogues.text: You should fight one another for the honor of leadership.

dialogues.speaker: NEBULA
dialogues.text: Sounds fair.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: That’s not necessary...

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: I’ve got some blasters right here. Unless you want to use knives.  141

dialogues.speaker: MANTIS
dialogues.text: Oh, yes, please, use knives-

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: No one’s using knives!

dialogues.speaker: GROOT
dialogues.text: I am Groot! Quill and Thor exchange nervous laughter.

dialogues.speaker: THOR
dialogues.text: There'll be no knifing young Quail today. Everyone knows who’s in charge. A long awkward moment passes.

dialogues.speaker: QUILL
dialogues.text: Me. (sotto, to Thor) Right? Thor just smiles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship rises. WHOOSH. IT MAKES THE JUMP AND DISAPPEARS.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTRUCTION CREWS REMOVE RUBBLE FROM AVENGERS COMPOUND.
dialogues.text: COMMAND TENT stands in a clearing beside... A NEW QUANTUM TUNNEL (3.0). As STEVE, SAM, and BUCKY wait, SMART HULK makes last minu adjustments. He finally opens A CASE: THE SIX INFINITY STONES GLOW INSIDE.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Remember, you’ll have to return the stones to the exact moment they were taken. Otherwise, we’re still looking at a whole bunch of nasty alternate realities.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Got it. I'll clip all the branches.  142 Steve takes the case.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: You know, I tried. When I had the gauntlet. I really tried to bring her back. (beat) I miss her.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Me, too.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: You'd better get going. We’re almost ready for you. Steve and Sam approach the platform.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: You look a little nervous going by yourself. Ask nicely, I’1l go with you.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You're a good man, Sam. But this one’s on me. When Steve reaches the platform, BUCKY stops him, pointed

dialogues.speaker: STEVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don’t do anything stupid ‘til I get back, okay?

dialogues.speaker: BUCKY BARNES
dialogues.text: How can I? You’re taking all the stupid with you. Steve grins. Bucky gives him a long hug.

dialogues.speaker: BUCKY BARNES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gonna miss you, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: It’s going to be okay, Buck. Steve picks up Mjolnir and takes his place on the platfor SAM LOOKS TO SMART HULK AT THE CONSOLE.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: How long’s this gonna take?  143

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: For him, as long as he needs. For us, five seconds. (calling out) Ready, Cap? You’re good to go. Meet you right back here, okay? Steve glances at Bucky as he answers.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You bet.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: Going Quantum in three, two, one. STEVE TAPS HIS CUFF AND SHRINKS TO NOTHING.

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaand, returning in five... four...three...two...one- Silence. Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: I don’t know. He blew past our time stamp. He should be here.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Get him back!

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: I’m trying.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Get him the hell back-

dialogues.speaker: SMART HULK
dialogues.text: I’M TRYING! Just then...Bucky looks out to the water.

dialogues.speaker: BUCKY BARNES
dialogues.text: Sam. Sam turns...

dialogues.speaker: EXT AVENGERS COMPOUND, RIVERBANK
dialogues.text: Work crews have cleared a space overlooking the river. There, AN OLD MAN sits on a bench, staring out at the Hud  144 Move around him to find SAM watching from A FEW YARDS AWA

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Hey, Cap. The man turns and we now see: STEVE ROGERS, age 112.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: Hi, Sam.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Something go wrong...or something go right?

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: I thought, after everything that’s happened...maybe I should try out some of that life Tony always told me to get.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: How was it? Steve looks at the river, 112 years of emotion in his fac

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: It was beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: I’m happy for you. Really.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Only thing bumming me out is now I live in a world without Captain America. Steve pulls up A CASE from beside him, giving it to Sam.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: That's kind of why I’m here. Sam unzips it, revealing...A BRAND NEW SHIELD.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Where did you even get this?

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: I had a little time to travel. (beat) Try it on.  145 Sam hesitates. He glances back at Bucky, who nods. Then S picks up the shield...and puts it on.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How does it feel?

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Like it’s someone else's.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: It isn’t. Sam tries to check his emotion. He shakes Steve’s hand.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: Thank you. I’11 try my best. Steve rests his other hand on Sam's.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: That's why it’s yours. Sam smiles, noticing...STEVE’S TARNISHED WEDDING RING.

dialogues.speaker: SAM WILSON
dialogues.text: You gonna tell me about her? Steve smiles to himself at the end of a long, long life.

dialogues.speaker: OLD STEVE
dialogues.text: Nope. I don’t think I will. CUE MUSIC: “IT’S BEEN A LONG, LONG TIME,” HARRY JAMES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PACKARD rolls down a block of WASHINGTON D.C. ROW HOUSE TITLE: “WASHINGTON D.C., 1949.” Find a red house in the middle of the block. Move up the steps to the front door...WHICH HANGS WIDE OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TEA CUP LIES SHATTERED on the hardwood. We hear Harry James. Move into the living room...past the record player TO WHERE STEVE DANCES WITH A WOMAN. They rock back and fo barely moving. As they turn, we see...  146 PEGGY CARTER, tears streaming down her face. He steps on toe. She laughs. As they turn, we get a good look at... Steve Rogers, eyes shut, finally getting the life he deserves. THE END.  All rights reserved.
